newsitem.title: GERMANY: Buba allots 69.6 bln marks in tender at 3.00 pct.
newsitem.headline: Buba allots 69.6 bln marks in tender at 3.00 pct.

text.p: The Bundesbank said on Wednesday it has allocated 69.6 billion marks of securities repurchase funds at this week's tender at a fixed 3.00 percent.
The German central bank accepted 27.5 percent of the bids made for the 14-day funds.
A repo pact for 63.0 billion marks at a fixed 3.00 percent expires on Wednesday, so a net 6.6 billion marks is flowing into the market.
The Bundesbank said banks bid for 253.1 billion marks of the repurchase funds this week.
